description:
Denmark Melodi Grand Prix, the Danish national selection for the Eurovision Song Contest, is scheduled for the final on February 28, 2026.

This market resolves to the artist who wins the Melodi Grand Prix 2026 competition for Denmark.

If at any point it is impossible for the listed artist to win Melodi Grand Prix 2026 based on the rules of the competition (i.e. they are eliminated), this market may immediately resolve to "No".

If no winner is announced by March 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "Other". All ties will be broken according to official rules of the contest.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Eurovision, including live footage of the competition, however a consensus of credible reporting (e.g., https://eurovisionworld.com/) will suffice.

events.title: Denmark Melodi Grand Prix 2026 Winner

question: Will Lasse Skriver win Melodi Grand Prix 2026?
